name: UE4 First Person Platformer Demo
description:
This Demo Level serves as a showcase of the First Person Platformer Template pack which was created to give users a base for a platformer project. The pack contains almost foundations needed to create a complete game. All mechanics are made in Blueprints and designed to allow for easy customization and ajustments.

Available mechanics:
  • Movement Power-ups 
  • Collectibles (coins, health)
  • Interactive Mechanisms (doors, buttons)
  • Floating Platforms 
  • LaunchPads 
  • Hazards (spikes, traps)
  • Checkpoint & Teleporters 
  • Spawners
More information and screenshots:

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/first-person-platfomer-te...
